list.description:
Eng : This sight is for #Type90 ,Japanese Version, Improved from @BarteG98PL #M1Abrams sight.
I JUST CHANGED TEXT, I DO NOT OWN THIS SIGHT.
(If you are offended, please let me know.)
Currently not perfect, it will continue to be updated.

中文 : 90式戰車的日文版本瞄具，改良自@BarteG98PL 的M1艾布蘭瞄具。
我只有更改文字而已，該瞄具並不屬於我。
目前翻譯得不是很好，還會持續更新。

PT-76b Reticle for mainly HEAT FS made for 4K Monitors it has built in MG zeros and 0 - 700 meter static ranging

(Top triangle is 20m, bottom 200)
(Top of first circle 300m, Middle 400m, Bottom 500m)
(Top of lower smaller circle 500m, Middle 600m, Bottom 700m)

Mg zeros start at 25m (largest) 50 - 75 - 100 - 150 - 200 - 250

Note - the static ranging circles for main cannon might not work on lower resolutions (Triangle and Mg will stay zeroed)
Hope You Enjoy :)
#russia #ussr #pt76b #acss

Simple sight for the AUBL/74 HVG

#simple #fictional #sight #aubl_74_hvg #aubl74_hvg #aubl74_60

Another AUBL/74 HVG sight !

There is five simple boxes meant to find the range of something that fit in, something about 3.25m wide or 2.4m tall
The sight only features markings for the APFSDS and the LMG (LMG rounds dissapear after 1500m btw)
The 60 and 30 indicators show a approximate and rough estimate of the lead for a shot at a relative speed of 60 and 30 kph at about 1000-1500m (It would be a shame to not profit of that stabiliser !)

Schindibee's fictional "AESHNA" Sight for AUBL/74 HVG

#customsight #sight #fictional #aubl74 #aubl74_hvg #operation_heat

This is a fully fictional sight for the "Operation HEAT" reward vehicle AUBL/74 HVG (Italian Premium).

The sight features quick-use features like main graduation, ranging funnel and deflection aiming aids for the APFSDS ammo and simple distance scales for the HE ammo and coaxial MG, as well as a stadiametric rangefinder for tanks with height 2.5m.

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommend

A rather utilitarian sight for the AUBL/74 HVG. Has range scales for both ammo types, and a stadiametric rangefinder.

#aubl_74_hvg

Hello everyone this is my first sight. It is made under Cromwell 1, made it for themselves decided to upload if someone need. As far as possible I will finish it.(so far it's only under the shot Mk projectile.5, but since this is not the final version I will finish it)
If anyone has any suggestions on sights to write suddenly I can.
I made it under the mouse wheel multiplier 52%
P. s I looked at the Mk8 projectile and everything is fine, you can use.

#sight #britishtanks #britain #british #cromwell #cromwell_mk1

English
I've been bored so I made this simple sight. It is adjustable, so can be used in any tank (I hope so). Feel free to let me know what you think of it and what would you like to change.

Русский
Мне было скучно, поэтому я сделал этт простой прицел. Он регулируется, поэтому его можно использовать в любом танке (я надеюсь на это). Не стесняйтесь, дайте мне знать, что вы об этом думаете и что бы вы хотели изменить.

#sight #simplesight #nonhistoical #adjustable

AUBL/74 Sight


  • Update 3:
    Fixed higlighting for the sight at night. Sorry I didn't do this earlier but I had no idea how to highlight text until now (lines are automatically highlighted).
  • Update 2:
    A little update on the making of AUBL/74 HVG sight. I don't feel like making it anymore as I'm getting tired of WarThunder. Plus I don't think there's that much desire from people for me to make that sight. @Schindibee 's sight is already good so I don't see much reason for me to make another (unless people like my layout). Maybe I'll reconsider in the future, but for now I'll take a break and wil

2 Variants Of The FCS For Japanese 105mm's. Modified Orignal (EN) & Translated (JP)

Original By @zRirez

Pzkpfw VIII Maus sight for Simulator Battles

Calibrated countering the parallax effect (view from gunner sight) from 30 m to 2400 m (for main shell - PzGr 43).


  • Includes radial ranging scale with moving marker for APCBC (PzGr 43) and HE (Sprgr L/4,5) 128 mm shells on the right side.
  • Includes radial ranging scale with moving marker for HEAT (Hl.Gr 38) and HE (Sprgr 34) 75 mm shells on the left side.
  • Includes range finding funnel for ranges 400 m to 2200 m for 2.45 m height objects.

Ballistic line with dots is for PzGr 43 (APCBC). Four small dots below the peak are indicating 200, 300, 40

Simple chevron sight for T-62, as requested by @SVitoi
Works with APFSDS/HEAT/HE shells
#t62 #sight #ussr #62

Simple chevron sight for Object 906
Works with both the APHE and HEAT shells.

#object906 #object_906 #sight #ussr #906 #object
The best sights

Набор универсальных прицелов в виде UserSights 1,2,3,4,5,6
Например, Sight 1 лучше смотрится на ранних танках, Sight5 - на фугасницах, а Sight6 подходит к большинству ОБТ.

Установка:
1. разархивировать в WarThunder\UserSights
2. В игре нажать правый Alt+F9
3. В настройках/общие боевые настройки/использовать альтернативную сетку прицела - выбрать наиболее подходящий прицел, от 1 до 6.

4.* Copy1.bat, copy2.bat - копируют в каждую папку все 6 прицелов, если допустим в них вручную внесены какие либо изменения и их все надо заменить. Copy1- основной файл, в нем прицелы на все почти танк...
Just a simple sight that is helping me for far engagement so why not sharing for those who struggles with standard sights or don't like them. #roland #roland_1 #amx_30_roland #amx_30_roland_1

A simple generic sight intended for use with ATGM vehicles,

This sight compared to the stock version offers less clutter and should give a clearer sight picture when guiding the rocket to its target

#customsight #sight #atgm #generic

Updates

Version 1.0 - 6/7/2019

- Main release

Description:

Custom made sights for the M1IP Abrams based on some Battlefield 4 sights
Designed for the M774 APFSDS

Variants

m1ip_z Standard sight (pic 1-2)
m1ip_z_r Sight with horizontal, adjustable range marks (pic 3-4)
m1ip_z_r_2 Sight with horizontal, adjustable range marks with numbers (pic 5-6)

Installation:

1) Download & Unzip
2) Place the unzipped folder in your War Thunder/UserSights folder (if it UserSights doesn't exist, create one)
3) Launch War Thunder
4) Go into Test Drive with the corresponding vehicle
5) Go into Settings >

Updates

This zip file includes all the gun sights which I used. some gunsight is made by other users.
The most important thing is the excel template which allows yourself made a gunsight easier.

Three gun sights mode
1, only ballistic line
2, only funnel line
3, ballistic and funnel line

some format is modified base on "Vers" and " Schindibee" 's gunsights format. so I hereby say thank you to you.

Full realistic sights for Leclerc (S1, S2, S2 AZUR and SXXI)

10-28-2023 : UPDATE => Added Leclerc S2 AZUR.

FULL Realistic sights for Leclerc tanks (S1, S2, S2 AZUR and SXXI).

Each 3 folders contains following sights:

-Normal day optic
-Thermal view optic
-Duplicate screen for gunner
-Sight normal day optic for large resolution 3620x2036

For all sights, Combat elevation to 1500m with APFSDS.

Schindibee's fictional "AESHNA" Sight for Merkava Mk.1

#customsight #sight #fictional #merkava #merkava1 #merkava_mk1

This is a fully fictional sight for the Merkava Mk.1 (US event vehicle).

The sight features quick-use features like main graduation, ranging funnel and deflection aiming aids for the APFSDS ammo and simple distance scales for the HEAT-FS, HESH, SMOKE ammos and coaxial MG.

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommended anyway to try out the sights)...

Hi guys, i just want to share my Sim sight for the C1 Ariete for the APFSDS. It isnt a beauty but it works.

This thing is still work in progress and i wouldnt say it is to to acurate but its still better than learning the paralax.

The First marking is 20 Meters but at ranges this close you realy shouldnt shoot in the sight.

Have a good one !

Mentions: I thank SMILY4 for the nice custom sight editor with out his work i wont be able to make this sight.
and Minedeployder for the Tipp with the arcade testdrive!

#ariete #sight #sim #arietec1 #simulator
